uk.ac.sanger.cgp.autocsa.beans

Class CSAOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.sanger.cgp.autocsa.beans.CSAOutput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class CSAOutput
extends java.lang.Object

    Class for holding objects associated with CSA output.

      • setCSAMutTraceAnalInfo

        public void setCSAMutTraceAnalInfo(SeqTraceAnalysis traceAnal)
        Updates the Tumour Type TraceDetails bean, traceMut.

        Note, traceMut must have been set before calling this method.

        Parameters:
        traceAnal - the SeqTraceAnalysis object holding the trace analysis

      • setCSAWtTraceAnalInfo

        public void setCSAWtTraceAnalInfo(SeqTraceAnalysis traceAnal)
        Updates the Wild Type TraceDetails bean, traceWt.

        Note, traceWt must have been set before calling this method.

        Parameters:
        traceAnal - the SeqTraceAnalysis object holding the trace analysis

        CSAVersion - the AutoCSA version

      • addMutation

        public void addMutation(Mutation mut,
               MutationDetails mutDetails)
        Adds a Mutation and MutationDetails bean pair to the mutationList and mutationDetailsList ArrayLists.

        Note, the ArrayLists are created if they don't already exist.

        Parameters:
        mut - the Mutation ArrayList
        mutDetails - the MutationDetails ArrayList

      • modifyMutationType

        public void modifyMutationType(int mutPos,
                      int mutType,
                      int newMutType)
        Modifies the mutation type code for a specified mutation in the ArrayList of mutations The mutation to modify is speciified by position and type code

        For example inputs of (100,1,10) changes the type code from 1 to 10 for a mutation at position 100

        Parameters:
        mutPos - the mutation position on the sts
        mutType - the code indicating the mutation type to modify
        newMutType - the new code to use for the mutation

      • removeMutations

        public int removeMutations(int numMutations,
                  int offset)
        Removes a specified number of Mutation and MutationDetails bean pairs from the mutationList and mutationDetailsList ArrayLists.

        For example inputs of (3,2) remove mutations n-2,n-3,n-4.

        Parameters:
        numMutations - the number of mutations to remove
        offset - the list offset at which to start removing

      • getNormalNormalComp

        public boolean getNormalNormalComp()
        Gets the current value of isNormalNormalComp
        Returns:
        Current value of isNormalNormalComp

      • setNormalNormalComp

        public void setNormalNormalComp(boolean isNormalNormalComp)
        Sets the value of isNormalNormalComp
        Parameters:
        isNormalNormalComp - New value for isNormalNormalComp

      • writeMutations

        public void writeMutations(int mutType)
        Writes to STDOUT basic information about mutations stored in the arraylist mutationList held in the class. The objects in the arraylist are type Mutation. (Mainly used for debugging)
        Parameters:
        mutType - - DB code for mutation type to write information for

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
